++ Content Distribution

CD is how content is distributed through multiple machines. Examples include:
    * [Network]s
    * the [Internet]
    * distributed community

This content can be:
    * [Update]s
    * [Information] for the ExpandSystem
    * ReviewStore
    * CollaborativeData
    * DistributedStatistics
    * [Configuration]
    * [Files]

++Implementation

Content reaching large numbers of people requires lots of resources. DC is content that has this problem and can be solved through the following strategies:
    * [NetworkCacher]
    * [DistributedDataNetwork]s
    * CommunityNetwork
